channel.title: 13.5oz Kids Water Bottle - Pink - Mermaid
channel.description: Boasts vibrant colors and playful patterns, enticing kids to stay hydrated with its attractive appearance. Crafted from BPA-free Tritan material, this bottle is completely non-toxic, ensuring the utmost safety for children. Designed for small hands, kids can operate the bottle with a simple push of the flip-top lid, promoting independent drinking. With wide-mouth openings and a removable straw, cleaning is a breeze, and the spill-proof lid keeps drinks mess-free, perfect for hydration on the go.

record.title: 17oz Foldable Silicone Bottle - Pink
record.description: Anti-deformation, anti-leakage, maintain a complete shape, comfortable to hold, and eliminate leakage annoyance. 17.5 oz/500 ml, compressed to 1.77 inches, light and portable, suitable for various activities, commuting, camping, keep hydrated at any time, life is under control. Made of food-grade silicone, BPA-free, non-toxic, tasteless, high and low temperature resistant, environmentally friendly and sustainable, protecting you and the environment.

record.description: Anti-deformation, anti-leakage, maintain a complete shape, comfortable to hold, and eliminate leakage annoyance. 17.5 oz/500 ml, compressed to 1.77 inches, light and portable, suitable for various activities, commuting, camping, keep hydrated at any time, life is under control. record.title: 17oz Kids Water Bottle - Pink - Unicorn2
record.description: The push-button design allows for effortless one-handed drinking, making it convenient for kids to use throughout the day. Crafted from robust, BPA-free Tritan plastic, It is resistant to impacts, stains, and odors, ensuring its durability. The top-tier leak-proof design guarantees that items will stay secure even during vigorous activities, keeping the backpack dry and organized. Utilizing exquisite spray painting technology, we bring various animated characters to life, making the process of replenishing water enjoyable for children.

record.title: 27oz Tritan Bottle - Piink
record.description: Crafted from Tritan, a safe and durable plastic, is free from harmful BPA and toxins. Comes with graduated markings and a convenient stylish strap. Designed for sustainability, this bottle is reusable, reducing single-use plastic waste and making it an eco-friendly choice. With an 800ml (27oz) capacity, provides ample hydration for your daily activities.

record.title: 17oz Foldable Silicone Bottle - Black
record.description: Anti-deformation, anti-leakage, maintain a complete shape, comfortable to hold, and eliminate leakage annoyance. 17.5 oz/500 ml, compressed to 1.77 inches, light and portable, suitable for various activities, commuting, camping, keep hydrated at any time, life is under control. Made of food-grade silicone, BPA-free, non-toxic, tasteless, high and low temperature resistant, environmentally friendly and sustainable, protecting you and the environment.

record.title: 20oz Flip-Top Tritan Bottle - Dark Blue
record.description: The bottle is designed for easy handling, featuring a double-lock mechanism that allows you to open and secure the bottle cap with just one hand. Includes a Removable Filter and Fruit Infusion Formula to Boost Vitamins Made from Tritan, the safest and most durable plastic material for bottles. With a 20-ounce (600 ml)Moderate Capacity, it's ideal for your daily hydration needs.
